author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Prefer the 'grep' utility found in $PATH
over what autoconf wants. Autoconf usually prefers GNU grep which is ggrep
on some systems -- and which happened to be (temporarily?) broken for me

author: jbellis
msg: move CompactionIterator, CompactionManager, and the CompactedRow classes into the new compaction package
